title: Do you gain wisdom from reading the news everyday? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, in no way. I might even lose wisdom, considering the way journalism focuses on sensational, leaving fact checking and a neutral stance aside. Reaching for the news is a human reflex, resulting from our need to take the pulse of the community - at whatever level. Unfortunately, this otherwise natural reflex rather returns rubbish and a feeling of dissatisfaction and disorientation.
